0.name: Gamecat
0.content: ...This game is terrible,@yet I can't stop playing...

repeat.name: Gamecat
repeat.content: One of my friends told me that Geocats is more than just a videogame.@She told me that they're an ancient organisation of cats.

r2.content: They spend thier time searching the world for it's hidden treasures and far-out mysteries.

r3.content: Don't get your hopes up though, I've also heard it's almost impossible to join their weird club...
